review_title: for god sake they broke it
one_reviews_text: When beast pets began updating, i grew excited. I began to play a map, checking what was new but i couldn't grab anything. Went into another  map, stilll broken, couldn't do anything exept from touching and clicking on the  menu. Restarted the game and my computer, still broken. Please fix this, i love this game with all my heart and i hope it gets fixed. I play on an oculus rift and getting an oculus quest for christmas.
review_feedback:
Hi there! We're so sorry to hear that you encountered a bug. We fixed the menu error and you should be able to play without problems now :)

If you need help in the future, please email us at support@beastpets.com or message us on Discord: https://discord.gg/Av6Ta6C

one_reviews_text: The little dragons made my day, thank you!

--My 11 year old daughter
THIS IS LIKE THE BEST THING EVER!  THEY ARE SO ADORABLE!
--Also my 11 year old daughter
Aww, it's adorable!  It's like a flying kitten!
--Me

Dude, I had no idea how much I was missing this in my life.

Update:  It's been over an hour.  She hasn't stopped playing with the dragons.

review_title: Baby Dragons are so cute and awesome!
one_reviews_text: From the moment I tried this one I knew it would be a hit for introducing friends and family to VR.  My nieces and nephews think Virtual Reality is the coolest and I am really excited to have them play this title this holiday season.  There is so much interaction here with the dragons.  It has especially great and easy setup, easy to understand controls.  Perfect :)

Beast Pets is a really fun open-world game that's great for both first-time and experienced VR users. The interactions with the dragons feel really natural and and environments are great. I would definitely recommend this game to any pet lovers looking for a whimsical VR game!
